data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 737,437 lost people in  Ariyalur, Tamil Nadu, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ariyalur, Tamil Nadu, India
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 754,900 people living in Ariyalur through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary: On average, 159 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Ariyalur, Tamil Nadu, India.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Spirit, help the church in the county of Ariyalur do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Jesus, remind the disciples in the county of Ariyalur to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Father, open to your people a door for the word, to speak the mystery of Christ to the Malai Vedan people.
Spirit, please convict the believers in Ariyalur, Tamil Nadu, India to not assume the ministry is for professional clergy, but for all who have been called by you.
Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the county of Ariyalur. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Ariyalur, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

location.name: Ariyalur
location.people_groups_list: Mala Pulayan, Sahari, Vellalan Virakodi, Patnulkaran, Hill Pulayan
